thread.title: New crimefighting technique makes fingerprints glow neon
thread.title_full: New crimefighting technique makes fingerprints glow neon

title: New crimefighting technique makes fingerprints glow neon
text:
New crimefighting technique makes fingerprints glow neon 
Cnet Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Ashley discusses Stanford's auto-drifting DeLorean, a new and more efficient way for forensics teams to recover fingerprints and a 3D-printed car and house that can power each other....
